aircraft.value: Skyguard MK-7 - AC-1628-494 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 17/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 18/12/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 20/12/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 24/12/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 26/12/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
